title: Bronze reacts to 'frustrating' Champions League draw
text:
Chelsea defender Lucy Bronze reflects on a "frustrating" game against her former club Barcelona, following a 1-1 draw in the Women's Champions League.

WATCH MORE: Chelsea rue missed chances in draw with Barcelona

Available to UK users only.
summary: Chelsea's defender Lucy Bronze speaks about frustrating second-half against her former club Barcelona as they draw 1-1 in the Women's Champions League.
